wordGroup: under the auspices of 由…赞助或主办，在……保护下；在…的主持下；在…保护下

sentences.en: He took that as an auspice of happiness.
sentences.cn: 他把那看作是幸福的征兆。

sentences.en: People regard it as bird of happiness and auspice.
sentences.cn: 人们将其视为幸福吉祥之鸟。

sentences.en: He took her gentle words as an auspice of happiness.
sentences.cn: 他把她温柔的话当作是幸福的吉兆。
